logic

Class Throw_Dart

  • java.lang.Object
    • logic.Throw_Dart

  • class Throw_Dart
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Throw_Dart is used when the hero throws a dart.

    • Method Detail

      • find_dragon

        private boolean find_dragon(Game g,
                            Hero h,
                            int[] new_pos)
        Determines if there is a dragon in a given position which can be hit by the hero's dart. If a dragon exists it is killed by the dart.
        Parameters:
        g - the game
        h - the hero
        new_pos - the position we want to check
        Returns:
        true, if a dragon is found
